string.value: Windoo no hidari hanbun ni wa, torakku no shatai no nakami, soochaku sareteiru buki, kakushu kyooka soochi to sono surotto ga hyooji sareteiru. Migigawa wa 'rando' windoo de, chikaku no kibako ni aru aitemu, akutibuna aitemu no rittai gazoo (kaasoru o awaseru) , soshite 'pikku ooru' botan ga hyooji sareru. Buki no aiko n wa, shatai ya kibako kara buki no surotto ni doraggu ando doroppu dekimasu. Surotto kara buki o, kaagowindoo kara aitemu o rando windoo ni okuto, geemu mein gamen no pureiyaa no kuruma no chikaku ni, pureiyaa ga rando windoo ni idoo saseta aitemu ga haitteiru kibako ga hyooji saremasu.
Kikai tokusei

Windoo no migi hanbun ni wa , pureiyaa no sharyoo no shoosaina tokusei , buki o soobi shita pureiyaa no sharyoo no 3D gazoo, unten seki, shatai no tokusei ga hyooji saremasu. Gazoo no shita ni aru botan wa, hyooji sareru joohoo o kirikaemasu? sharyoo nitsuite, shatai to unten seki nitsuite, buki nitsuite. Kono windoo de wa, buki guruupu o sai wariate suru koto ga dekimasu. Windoo no hidari hanbun ni wa, torakku bodi no naiyoo, soobi sareteiru buki to sono surotto, kakushu kyooka debaisu ga hyooji saremasu. Sono tame, torakku ni atarashii debaisu o toritsuke, sono tokusei ga dono yoo ni henka suru ka o kakunin suru koto ga dekimasu.
Tasuku risuto

Kono menyuu de wa, anata ga okonau koto ni dooi shita, mataha sudeni itta subete no tasuku o mitsukeru koto ga dekimasu. Tasuku wa sukurooru o tsukatte, kaishi chiten mataha shuuryoo chiten ga aru mappu de firuta ringu dekimasu. Mata, subete no tasuku o hyooji suru ka, akutibuna tasuku dake o hyooji suru ka o kirikaeru koto mo dekimasu. Kaku tasuku ni wa, sore o kanryoo suru tame ni hitsuyoona akushon o setsumei suru setsumei ga arimasu. Setsumei no yoko ni wa botan ga ari, sore o osuto mappu ya reedaa joo ni shigoto no rando maaku ga hyooji saremasu. Tasuku ni wa, sore o seikoo saseru tame ni kanryoo shinakerebanaranai ikutsu ka no koomoku ga aru baai ga aru. Korera no koomoku wa tasuku no setsumei no shita ni ari, sorezore mappu joo no basho o shimesu koto ga dekiru. Tokubetsuna koomoku no risuto o hiraku botan mo aru.
Tokubetsu kamoku
Supesharu aitemu botan o kurikku suruto, tasuku o kanryoo suru tame ni hitsuyoona aitemu no risuto to sono setsumei, 3D gazoo ga hyooji saremasu.
Genchi chizu

Chizu wa, chikei joo no hookoo o kakunin suru tame no juuyoona tsuurudesu. Chizu ni wa, toshi, chizu kara no deguchi, tokubetsu ni chuui subeki basho nado, subete no juuyoona obujekuto ga hyooji saremasu. Chizu ni wa tsu no moodo ga arimasu. Windoo no migi joo ni aru taioo suru kii o osu koto de kirikaeru koto ga dekimasu. Joohoo moodo de wa, mausu no hidari botan de chizu joo no obujekuto o kurikku suruto, sono tekisuto no setsumei o miru koto ga dekimasu. Booeki moodo de shuuraku o sentaku suruto, sono shuuraku o saigo ni hoomon shita toki no subete no shoohin no kakaku o miru koto ga dekimasu. Kakaku no risuto wa, kongo no sankoo no tame ni kioku shiteoku koto ga dekimasu (tatoeba, betsu no mappu no kakaku o sugu ni miru koto ga dekimasu).
Sekai chizu
Guroobaru mappu de wa, pureiyaa ga otozureta subete no chiiki to, sonokan no tsuushin keiro o miru koto ga deki, sudeni oopun shiteiru chiiki o kirikaeru koto mo dekiru.
Hisutorii wa, pureeyaa ni okotta mottomo juuyoona dekigoto o subete kiroku shita monodearu.
Shoseki (Shiryoo)
Shoseki ni wa, furui shinbun, zasshi, hon nado, samazamana joohoogen ga osamerareteiru.
Guruupu wake

Kotonaru habatsu to ryookoona kankei o tamotsu koto wa, sekai de ikinokoru tame no juuyoona yoosodearu. Kono sekushon de wa, dare ga anata nitaishite atatakai kanjoo o daiteiru no ka, soshite dare ga anata no nodo ni kamitsukoo to shiteiru no ka o shiru koto ga dekiru.
Kono sekushon o mireba, senshu no idoo kyori, shottosuu, kakutoku shookin o itsu demo shiraberu koto ga dekiru.
Hyakka jiten
Kyarakuta ga geemu chuu ni chikuseki shita chishiki wa subete koko ni okareru. Taikoosha ya buki, habatsu no setsumei nadoda.
Shoppu/buki koonyuu

Koko de buki ya kyooka aitemu o koonyuu shi, sugu ni tekisetsuna surotto ya bodi ni haichi suru koto ga dekimasu. Koonyuu suru ni wa, aitemu no aiko n o shoppu windoo (gamen migigawa) kara bodi no windoo (gamen hidarigawa) ni doraggu suru ka, tekisetsuna surotto ni chokusetsu doraggu shimasu. Shoppu no aitemu o migi kurikku shite koonyuu suru koto mo dekimasu. Kono baai, aitemu wa torakku no nidai ni hyooji sare, hitsuyoona kingaku ga okane kara sashihikaremasu. Nani ka o uru ni wa, nidai no aiko n o torakku no bodi (gamen hidarigawa) kara shoppu windoo (gamen migigawa) ni doraggu shimasu. Mataha, aitemu o migi kurikku shite uru koto mo dekimasu. Koonyuu suru aitemu no kakaku to tokusei ga tsuuru chippu ni hyooji saremasu. Koonyuu shikin ga tarinai baai ya, torakku ni hitsuyoona surotto ga nai baai wa, aitemu no aiko n to tsuuru chippu ni hyooji saremasu.
Shoppu/shoohin no koonyuu

Shoohin o koonyuu suru moodo o sentaku suruto, koonyuu kanoona subete no shoohin no risuto, koonyuu kakaku, hanbai kakaku, suuryoo ga hyooji saremasu. Kono toshi de hanbai sareteinai shoohin wa haiiro de hyooji saremasu. Tokubetsuna firutaa o yuukoo ni suruto, uri ni dasareteiru shoohin dake o hyooji suru koto ga dekimasu. Shoohin no kakaku wa, pureiyaa no koodoo niyotte dooteki ni henka shimasu. Aitemu o uruto, sono jiten de ichiji teki ni shijoo ga hoowa jootai ni narimasu. Kono shoohin wa shibaraku no ma kakaku ga sagari, sonogo kakaku ga agarihajimemasu. Kau toki wa, sono gyaku no jookyoo ga kansatsu sareru. Torihiki wa shoohingoto ni riarutaimu de okonawareru. Machi ni wa itteiryoo no shoohin ga aru. Sore wa jikan totomoni kaifuku suru. Tsuujoo, machi wa donna shoohin de mo koonyuu suruga, kakaku wa ookiku hendoo suru. Sono tame, kookana shinamono o kau mae ni kooeki ruuto o teisatsu suru koto wa ri ni kanatteiru. Kishoona shinamono o horidashimono toshite te ni ireru tame ni wa, aru chiiki kara betsu no chiiki e to idoo shinakerebanaranai koto mo aru. Shikashi, kinrin no ikutsu ka no shuurakunaideareba, kanari yuuekina torihiki ga dekiru koto mo ooi.

Anata wa waakushoppu ni hairimashita.|Koko de wa kuruma no shuuri, nenryoo hokyuu, sookoo no kyooka ga dekimasu. Mata, bodi ya kyabin o henkoo suru koto mo dekimasu. Okane ni yoyuu ga areba, betsu no taipu no kuruma o kau koto mo dekimasu.|Windoo no hidari hanbun ni wa anata no torakku nikansuru joohoo ga ari, migi hanbun ni wa waakushoppu saabisu no risuto ga arimasu.
Kyabin no henkoo

Untendai o henkoo suru ni wa, untendai henkoo botan o kurikku shi, risuto kara kiboo no untendai o mausu kurikku de sentaku suru dakedesu. Henkoo wa torakku no 3D gazoo to sono setsumei ni hyooji saremasu. Untendai no sentaku nitsuite kakushin ga motetara, sono aikon no 'koonyuu' botan o kurikku shitekudasai. Koonyuu o kakunin suru windoo ga hirakimasu.
Bodi kookan

Bodi o henkoo suru ni wa, bodi henkoo botan o kurikku shi, mausu o kurikku shite risuto kara kiboo no bodi o sentaku suru dakedesu. Henkoo wa torakku no 3D gazoo to sono setsumei ni hyooji saremasu. Bodi ga kimattara , aiko n no 'koonyuu' botan o kurikku shitekudasai. Koonyuu kakunin windoo ga hirakimasu.
Shinsha koonyuu

Shinsha o koonyuu suru ni wa, 'Kuruma o kau' botan o kurikku suru hitsuyoo ga aru. Windoo ga hirakimasunode, sono naka kara o sukina mashin o erabi, iro o kasutamaizu shitekudasai. Sentaku ga kimattara, 'Sentaku' botan o oshitekudasai.
Sai tosoo
Kiboo no karaa ringu o sentaku shi, botan o oshite kuruma o nurikaeru.
Nenryoo hokyuu

Man tan kyuuyu botan o osuto, man tan kyuuyu ga dekimasu. Koonyuu suru nenryoo no ryoo o kontorooru shitai baai wa, 'Shudoo kyuuyu' botan o oshitekudasai. Suraidaa de hitsuyooryoo o settei shi, koonyuu o kakutei shimasu.

Subete no paatsu o shuuri suru baai wa, 'Subete shuuri' botan o kurikku shimasu. Dono bubun o shuuri suru ka o kontorooru shitai baai wa, 'Shudoo de shuuri' botan o kurikku shitekudasai. Shuuri kanoona subete no buhin no risuto to shuuri hiyoo ga hyooji saremasu. Buhin no namae o kurikku suruto, sono buhin ga shuuri saremasu. Paatsu no shuuri hani o kimetai baai wa, paatsumei no yoko ni aru bi choosei botan o kurikku shitekudasai. Suraidaa o shiyoo shite kiboo no shuuri hinshitsu o settei shi, buhinmei o kurikku shite koonyuu o kakutei shimasu. Tsuuru chippu ni shuuri nikansuru shoosai joohoo ga hyooji saremasu.
Danyaku no koonyuu

Danyaku no ryoo ga kagirareteiru juu dake ga sai sooten sareru. Kore wa omo ni oogata no juu to misairu ni tekiyoo sareru. Riroodooorubotan o osuto, sharyoo ni toosai sareteiru subete no juu, mataha shiyoo kanoona dake no okane ga kanzen ni riroodo saremasu. Dono juu ga riroodo sareru ka o kontorooru shitai baai wa, manyuaruriroodobotan o kurikku shimasu. Riroodo kanoona subete no juu no risuto to, sono hiyoo ga hyooji saremasu. Juu no namae o kurikku suruto riroodo saremasu. Shitei sareta juu no koonyuu suru chaajisuu o kettei suru hitsuyoo ga aru baai, sono juu no namae no yoko ni aru bi choosei botan o kurikku suru koto ga dekimasu. Suraidaa o tsukatte kiboo no chaaji no shitsu o settei shi, juu no namae o kurikku shite koonyuu o kakutei shimasu. Tsuuru chippu ni wa riroodo nikansuru shoosai joohoo ga hyooji saremasu.
Kyabin koonyuu no kakunin

Kyuu kyabin (hidarigawa) no subete no surotto no naiyoo o, shin kyabin (migigawa) no surotto ni idoo suru yoo motomeraremasu. Kore wa shudoo de okonau ka, subete idoo botan o tsukatte okonau. Mata, kono windoo de wa, atarashii kyabin no buki ya sonota no debaisu no surottosuu o mitsumoru koto ga deki, torihiki no saishuu kakaku o shiru koto ga dekimasu. Manzoku dekinai baai wa, 'Kyanseru' botan o oshitekudasai. Koonyuu ga kakujitsudeareba, 'Koonyuu' o kurikku shitekudasai. Gamen hidarigawa no surotto ni nokotteiru aitemu wa, furui kyabin to issho ni baikyaku saremasu.
Bodi koonyuu no kakunin

Kyuu hontai (hidarigawa) no subete no surotto no naiyoo o, shin hontai (migigawa) no surotto ni idoo suru yoo motomeraremasu. Kore wa shudoo de okonau koto mo, subete idoo botan o tsukatte okonau koto mo dekimasu. Mata, kono windoo de wa, atarashii takushii ni toosai sareru buki ya sonota no debaisu no surottosuu o mitsumori, torihiki no saishuu kakaku o shiru koto ga dekimasu. Manzoku dekinai baai wa, 'kyanseru' botan o oshitekudasai. Koonyuu ga kakujitsuna baai wa, 'koonyuu' o kurikku shitekudasai. Gamen hidari hanbun no surotto ni nokotteiru aitemu wa, furui shatai to issho ni baikyaku saremasu.
Kuruma koonyuu no kakunin

Furui torakku (hidarigawa) no subete no surotto no naiyoo o, atarashii torakku (migigawa) no surotto ni idoo suru yoo motomeraremasu. Kore wa, shudoo de okonau koto mo, subete idoo botan o tsukatte okonau koto mo dekimasu. Mata, kono windoo de wa, atarashii kyabu no buki ya sonota no debaisu no surottosuu o mitsumoru koto ga deki, torihiki no saishuu kakaku o shiru koto ga dekimasu. Manzoku dekinai baai wa, 'kyanseru' botan o oshitekudasai. Koonyuu ga kakujitsuna baai wa, 'koonyuu' botan o oshitekudasai gamen hidarigawa no surotto ni nokotteiru subete no aitemu wa, furui torakku to issho ni baikyaku saremasu.

Machi ya mura wa 'Ekusumakina' no sekai de mottomo juuyoona basho o shimeteiru. Booeki, kagaku, soshite mottomo juuyoona seikatsu no chuushinchidearu. Pureiyaa wa koko de, torakku no shuuri ya kyuuyu, buki no hokyuu o okonai, kooeki de okane o kasegu koto ga dekiru. Jimoto no hitobito to no komyunikeeshon wa iumademonai. Gamen migi joo no botan o osuto, baa, shoppu, waakushoppu ni idoo shimasu.

Gamen no migi hanbun ni wa, genzai baa ni iru zenin no aiko n ga arimasu. Gamen no migi hanbun ni wa, genzai baa ni iru hitotachi no aiko n ga hyooji sareteimasu. Kaiwa o hajimeru ni wa, kyarakutaa no gazoo o kurikku shitekudasai.

Kono windoo ni wa, kaiwa shiteiru kyarakutaa no ookina gazoo to, sono kyarakutaa no serifu, soshite riyoo kanoona kaitoo no sentakushi ga hyooji saremasu. Serifu o iu ni wa, mausu ka suuji kii de sentaku shimasu. Kono windoo o tojiru ni wa, taioo suru daiarogukyuu o sentaku shimasu.

Gamen hidariue ni wa reedaa ga arimasu. Reedaa ni wa teki (akai ten), pureiyaa no kuruma (chuuoo) , kamera ga muiteiru basho (sekutaa), rando maaku ga hyooji saremasu. Rando maaku made no kyori wa, reedaa no migigawa ni aru suuji de shimesaremasu (Suuji no iro wa rando maaku no iro ni taioo shiteimasu).
Supiido meetaa wa, torakku no genzai sokudo o dejitaru to anarogu de hyooji shimasu. Ribaasugia o ireruto suuji ga akaku narimasu.
Supiido meetaa

Kensetsu wa mashin no kanzenseidearu. Sono reberu o kanshi shinaito, kyarakutaa ga shindeshimau koto ga arimasu. Konsutorakushon ga kikenna hodo hikuku naruto, akai ranpu ga tentoo shimasu. Shuuri wa waakushoppu de ukeru koto ga deki, waakushoppu wa machi chuu ya sekaijuu ni tenzai shiteimasu.
Tsuyo sa

Nenryoo reberu o monitaa shite okanakereba, konnanna jookyoo ni ochiiru kanoosei ga aru. Tanku ga soradato, torakku wa bakkuappu batterii de hijoo ni teisoku de shika sookoo dekimasen. Nenryoo reberu ga kikenna hodo hikuku naruto, akai ranpu ga tentoo shimasu. Kyuuyu wa, toshibu dakedenaku sekaijuu ni tenzai suru seibi koojoo de okonau koto ga dekiru.

Gamen joobu ni wa, torakku no bodi to unten seki no moshikizu ga ari, korera no paatsu no sookoo no jootai o shimesu tame ni iro ga henka suru (ryokushoku wa kanzenna jootai, akairo wa ookina dameeji o uketa jootai, haiiro wa chimei tekina dameeji o uketa jootai);
Taimaa wa, pureeyaa ga kagirareta jikannai ni kanryoo suru tasuku o ataerareta toki ni hyooji saremasu.

Migigawa no aiko n wa, juu no gazoo, guruupu bangoo, danyaku no ryoo, kurippu no zanryoo o hyooji shimasu. Utsu tabi ni midori no baa (kurippu no tamasuu) ga hetteikimasu. Kurippu ga sora ni naruto jidooteki ni riroodo ga hajimari, sonokan wa shageki wa dekimasen. Mata, itsu demo ('R' kii o oshite) riroodo suru koto ga dekimasu. Kono toki, baa no iro ga kawari, man tan ni narimasu.
Kono eria ni wa, samazamana tekisuto messeeji ya taisen aite no repurika ga hyooji sareteiru.
Kadai no juryoo to kanryoo nikansuru juuyoona messeeji wa, kono basho ni hyooji saremasu.
Juuyoona messeeji

Gamen chuuoo ni wa sukoopu ga aru. Sono ue ni wa, juujisen joo ni aru sharyoo no namae to, sono sharyoo ga zokusuru habatsu ga hyooji sareteiru. Aka wa tekitai teki, midori wa yuukoo tekidearu. Shoojunki no hidarigawa ni wa teki no koozoo o shimesu injikeeta ga ari, migigawa ni wa teki no sookoo o shimesu injikeeta ga aru. Shoojunki no shita wa teki to no kyoridesu.
Teki no joohoo

Torakku ni hoomingu misairu ga 1 hatsu ijoo toosai sareteiru baai, teki ni mukeruto hoomingu shisutemu ga jidooteki ni hosoku o kaishi suru. Akamaru ga nuritsubusareruto, misairu wa hoomingu shiteiru.
Taagetto kakutoku

Kaagoaikon ga hyooji saretara, I kii o oshite kibako no naka no aitemu o pikkuappu dekiru koto o imi suru. HUD aiko n ga hyooji saretara, shigaichi ni iru koto o imi shi, H kii o osu koto de shigaichinai o sookoo dekiru.
Aitemumei ni mausu kaasoru o awaseruto, sono aitemu nikansuru joohoo ga hyooji saremasu.
Intaa feisu no meikaku ka gamen.
